text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga pluricarpellata is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Peru.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga pluricarpellata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38299A10106809. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38299A10106809.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
